sentences.sContent: The next morning I started trapping around the barn .
sentences.sContent_eng: The next morning I started trapping around the barn .
sentences.sCn: 第二天早晨，我就开始在谷仓附近下套子。

sentences.sContent: He left the blankets next to the barn door and waited for Duck to come with typewriter.
sentences.sContent_eng: He left the blankets next to the barn door and waited for Duck to come with typewriter.
sentences.sCn: 他立刻在谷仓门外留下了电热毯，然后就等着鸭子带回那台打印机。

synos.tran: 谷仓；畜棚；车库；靶（核反应截面单位）

remMethod.val: 酒吧(bar)加了个门(n)， 就变成了谷仓(barn)

trans.tranOther: a large farm building for storing crops, or for keeping animals in
